marklogic.body: What do you bunch of fly-by-night politicians think this is. Politics is not a game for the meek and weak, and this situation shows how weak the hierarchy o the COP is. All I am seeing here is a bunch of Cry babies who not getting their way, when instead, they should have been seeking to strengthen the party a long time ago. You dont win a chess game by being defensive. To me, the COP is a dying tribe, with it's stronger members looking to join a stronger tribe to Ensure survival
